thread.title: Are You Ready? Equifax Workforce Solutions Brings ACA IRS Reporting to Staffing World 2015
thread.title_full: Are You Ready? Equifax Workforce Solutions Brings ACA IRS Reporting to Staffing World 2015

author: admin
title: Are You Ready? Equifax Workforce Solutions Brings ACA IRS Reporting to Staffing World 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 9:00 AM   Equifax Inc. 
ATLANTA, Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- WHO: Equifax Workforce Solutions, a leader in human resource, analytics and verification services WHAT: Will present "1095, 4, 3, 2, 1...Are You Ready for ACA IRS Reporting?" at the ASA Convention & Expo -Staffing World 2015. WHEN: Tuesday, October 27 - Thursday, October 29, 2015 "1095, 4, 3, 2, 1...Are You Ready for ACA IRS Reporting?" is scheduled for Wednesday, October 28, 2015 at 2:30 p.m. CDT. WHERE: Gaylord Opryland Resort & Convention Center 2800 Opryland Drive Nashville, Tenn. Equifax Workforce Solutions will also exhibit its solutions at Booth No. 1318. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20060224/CLF037LOGO 
DETAILS: The inaugural year of the Affordable Care Act's employer mandate is coming to a close, leaving staffing professionals scrambling to meet the reporting requirements issued by the IRS. With their organizations subject to fines, it is critical that employers fully understand what is required to complete and submit Forms 1094 and 1095. 
During Staffing World 2015, David Seifert, director, Product Strategy, and Kristin Lewis, senior director, Product Management for Equifax Workforce Solutions , will discuss how employers can prepare for the upcoming ACA reporting deadlines. Drawing on their own experience in helping companies prepare for ACA, Seifert and Lewis will discuss some of the biggest challenges that organizations are facing and provide real world examples of how the staffing industry is preparing for the inevitable. Session attendees will hear the latest ACA legislative updates as well as effective ways to maintain compliance at their organizations. HR and staffing professionals and business leaders interested in learning how Equifax Workforce Solutions supports the needs of staffing companies of all sizes are encouraged to attend this interactive presentation. 
In addition to this thought leadership session, Lou Reavis, vice president, Strategic Solutions in Staffing will be on hand to discuss how Equifax Workforce Solutions helps support ACA management and HR compliance needs for staffing organizations. Conference attendees interested in meeting Reavis and learning more about Equifax Workforce Solutions should visit the company at Booth No. 1318. For more information about Staffing World 2015, please visit: https://americanstaffing.net/staffing-world-2015-2 . 
About Equifax Equifax is a global leader in consumer, commercial and workforce information solutions that provide businesses of all sizes and consumers with insight and information they can trust. Equifax organizes and assimilates data on more than 600 million consumers and 81 million businesses worldwide. The company's significant investments in differentiated data, its expertise in advanced analytics to explore and develop new multi-source data solutions, and its leading-edge proprietary technology enables it to create and deliver unparalleled customized insights that enrich both the performance of businesses and the lives of consumers. Equifax Workforce Solutions (also known as TALX), an Equifax business unit, is a leading provider of human resource, data, analytics and verification services. 
Headquartered in Atlanta, Equifax operates or has investments in 19 countries and is a member of Standard & Poor's (S&P) 500Â® Index. Its common stock is traded on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) under the symbol EFX. In 2014, Equifax was nominated as a Bloomberg BusinessWeek Top 50 company; its CIO was listed as one of the top 100 by CIO magazine; and the company was named to the Fintech 100 list, was recognized as a top 20 company to work for by the Atlanta Journal-Constitution, and was named a 2014 InformationWeek Elite 100 Winner. For more information, please visit www.equifaxworkforce.com or www.equifax.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/are-you-ready-equifax-workforce-solutions-brings-aca-irs-reporting-to-staffing-world-2015-300164733.html 
SOURCE Equifax Inc.
